data.name: Nanoscape
data.detailed_description:
Nanoscape takes users on a journey to the microscopic world. Explore the surface and interior of a cancer cell, exploring and learning about cellular anatomy and processes in a fantastically detailed simulation, based on the latest scientific research!

See also our Nanoscape VR app to explore this world in Virtual Reality!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1634740/Nanoscape_VR/

This is a collaborative project developed by the 3d Visualisation Aesthetics Lab (3DVAL) at the University of New South Wales (UNSW) Art and Design, funded by the Australian Research Council (ARC) Centre of Excellence in Bio-Nano Science and Technology (CBNS).
data.about_the_game:
Nanoscape takes users on a journey to the microscopic world. Explore the surface and interior of a cancer cell, exploring and learning about cellular anatomy and processes in a fantastically detailed simulation, based on the latest scientific research!

See also our Nanoscape VR app to explore this world in Virtual Reality!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1634740/Nanoscape_VR/

This is a collaborative project developed by the 3d Visualisation Aesthetics Lab (3DVAL) at the University of New South Wales (UNSW) Art and Design, funded by the Australian Research Council (ARC) Centre of Excellence in Bio-Nano Science and Technology (CBNS).
data.short_description: A first person exploration of a cancer cell deep in the human body, featuring a highly detailed simulation of cellular anatomy and processes based on the latest scientific research!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700K or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 37 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i9-7900X or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD highly recommended. 8GB+ VRAM recommended
